sentences.en: At his instigation we conceal the fact from the authorities.
sentences.cn: 我们受他的怂恿向当局隐瞒了事实.

sentences.en: Don't conceal the poverty of thought by the eccentric diction.
sentences.cn: 不要用这些怪僻的词藻来掩饰思想的贫乏.

sentences.en: Fine clothes could not conceal the girl's homeliness.
sentences.cn: 华丽的衣服并不能掩盖这个女孩的寻常容貌.

sentences.en: Frances decided to conceal the machine behind a hinged panel.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯决定把机器藏在带铰链的嵌板的后面。

sentences.en: He could hardly conceal his joy at his departure.
sentences.cn: 他几乎掩饰不住临行时的喜悦.

sentences.en: He could not conceal his annoyance at being interrupted.
He couldn't conceal his envy of me.
sentences.cn: 他掩饰不住对我的忌妒。

sentences.en: He had to conceal his identity to escape the police.
sentences.cn: 为了躲避警方,他只好隐瞒身份.

sentences.en: He made no attempt to conceal his dislike of me.
sentences.cn: 他毫不掩饰对我的厌恶。

sentences.en: He made no attempt to conceal his smirk.
sentences.cn: 他毫不掩饰自鸣得意的笑容.

sentences.en: He tried to conceal his instinctive revulsion at the idea.
sentences.cn: 他试图饰盖自己对这一想法本能的厌恶.

sentences.en: I did not conceal anything from him.
It took some effort to conceal her relief.
sentences.cn: 她好不容易才掩饰住宽慰的心情。

sentences.en: Lies cannot cover up [ conceal ] the facts.
sentences.cn: 谎言 掩盖 不了事实.

sentences.en: Robert could not conceal his relief.
sentences.cn: 罗伯特无法掩饰自己如释重负的心情。

sentences.en: The path was concealed by long grass.
sentences.cn: 小路隐藏在长长的草里。

sentences.en: The shadows concealed her as she crept up to the house.
sentences.cn: 她借着阴影蹑手蹑脚地走向房子。
